author: Hollie Silverman and Rosa Flores, CNN
title: Florida gov: Negligence at an elder care facility may be criminal
description: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis said negligence at the Atria Willow Wood assisted living facility in Broward County that led to several residents being diagnosed with coronavirus "could be" criminal.
content:
(CNN)Florida Governor Ron DeSantis said negligence at the Atria Willow Wood assisted living facility in Broward County that led to several residents being diagnosed with coronavirus "could be" criminal.
At least three coronavirus deaths and seven other cases… [+2285 chars]
